lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Josh Ravin was suspended Monday for 80 games following a positive test under Major League Baseball's drug program.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers' Pitcher Ravin Given 80-Game Drug Suspension
headline.main: Dodgers' Pitcher Ravin Given 80-Game Drug Suspension
